column4: how do people here see movies? i tried totem but it won't open any file
I prefer mplayer as well, but ubotu should have sent you info on getting totem to play your files
I would guess that Ubuntu (default with GNOME) is the most popular mostly because it's default :).  Just try them all and go with the one you like best, they all have their strong points
right click on one of them and delete it
